title: Frontend Architect
description: We are looking for a Frontend Architect to lead the development of our user-facing platforms. You will be responsible for defining the technical direction of our frontend stack, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience. Your role involves building reusable component libraries, implementing complex state management solutions, and optimizing application performance across various devices and browsers. You should have an expert-level command of TypeScript, React, and modern CSS techniques. Experience with Next.js, server-side rendering, and performance profiling tools is highly desired. A keen eye for design and detail is essential.
